name: Somanna (Regulavalasa Tatayya)
otherInfo: According to family history passed down through Maroju Suryanarayana, this marks the beginning of our documented ancestry. The family gradually relocated from Pata Bobbili to Jagannathapuram near Paravtipuram

children.name: Daughters
children.otherInfo: Historical records are unavailable

children.name: Chinnayya
children.otherInfo: Married into the Pedaprolu family of Alajangi, who are the forebears of the Pedaprolu Rajarao lineage

children.name: Somanna
children.otherInfo: Established matrimonial ties with the Mugada family from Pata Bobbili

children.name: Sanyasi
children.otherInfo: Wed into the Kosuru family of Parvatipuram, with Kannamma being Kosuru Raghunayakulu's sister. They made visits to Krishnapuram. Despite lacking formal education, he recognized education's importance and encouraged his son Somalingam's academic pursuits with firm guidance

children.name: Somalingam (Gumpa Swamy)
children.otherInfo: His wife hailed from the Addala family of Jogammapeta near Sitammapeta, daughter of Veerabhadrudu. While Somalingam devoted himself to scholarly pursuits, his wife possessed remarkable practical wisdom

children.name: Kannamma
children.otherInfo: Joined the Nadithoka family of Pedapadam through marriage. Tragically passed away during pregnancy without leaving descendants

children.name: Appalanarasamma
children.otherInfo: Became part of the Gannavarapu family from Junugulluvalasa. Lost her life to complications from medical treatment during pregnancy

children.name: Kanakaraju
children.otherInfo: United with the Patnala family through marriage to Chinnayya's daughter

children.name: Ramanamma
children.otherInfo: Married into the Mugada family of Mentada. Experienced challenges in married life

children.name: China Lakshmi
children.otherInfo: Joined the Simhadri family of Sirlam through marriage

children.name: Suryanarayana
children.otherInfo: Allied with the Chintaluru family of Sitanagaram through marriage. His wife is the daughter of Bhadrayya and Ammannamma, with Veeranna being Bhadrayya's younger sibling

children.name: Soma Sundaram
children.otherInfo: Connected to the Tarini family of Srikakulam through marriage. His wife is the daughter of Tammaraju (who served as R.D.O) and Ratnamma

children.name: Gopalam
children.otherInfo: Joined the Chitrada family of Sompeta through marriage to the daughter of Ammanna Achary and Savitramma

children.name: Rama Devi
children.otherInfo: Became part of the Anupoju family from Saluru through marriage. Her husband is the child of Seetayya and Satyavatamma

children.name: Uma Bharati
children.otherInfo: United with the Vanapalli family of Jeypore through marriage. Her husband is the son of Tatachary and Satyavatamma

children.name: Varaha Narasimhulu
children.otherInfo: Connected to the Addala family of Piridi through marriage to Appanna's daughters

children.name: Srirama Murthy
children.otherInfo: Allied with the Vangara family of Piridi. Born to Narayanamma

children.name: Lakshmi
children.otherInfo: Joined the Addala family of Piridi through marriage to Appalaswamy's son. She was born to Narayanamma

children.name: Murali
children.otherInfo: Born to Narayanamma

children.name: Bhavani
children.otherInfo: United with the Girijala family of Subhadra Village through marriage. Born to Narayanamma

children.name: Lalita
children.otherInfo: Became part of the Gurajapu family of Saluru through marriage. Born to Manikyamma

children.name: Varahalamma
children.otherInfo: United with the Kosuru family of Parvatipuram through marriage to her maternal uncle. The union remained without children

children.name: Amudamma
children.otherInfo: Joined the Mugada family of Pata Bobbili through marriage

children.name: Annapurnamma
children.otherInfo: Allied with the Patoju family through marriage to a Haridasu. Bore two daughters who passed away at birth. Following her husband's early death, she returned to live with her brother's family. In her later years, she developed leprosy

children.name: Kannayya
children.otherInfo: Connected to the Pedaprolu family of Alajangi through marriage

children.name: Ramamurthy
children.otherInfo: Passed without descendants

children.name: Chandrasekharam
children.otherInfo: Passed without descendants

children.name: Appalaswamy
children.otherInfo: Passed without descendants

children.name: Daughter
children.otherInfo: United with the Pedaprolu family through marriage

children.name: Daughter
children.otherInfo: Lived with hearing impairment

children.name: Adi Narayana
children.otherInfo: Allied with the Rajabhaktula family of Neelanagaram through marriage to Rajabhaktula Papayya's daughter Butchamma

children.name: Sanghameswaram
children.otherInfo: Having no biological children, welcomed Maroju Suryanarayana through adoption

children.name: Jagannatham
children.otherInfo: Passed without descendants

children.name: Varahalamma
children.otherInfo: Lost her only daughter in infancy

children.name: Mahalakshmi
children.otherInfo: United with the Manepalli family of Vizianagaram through marriage

children.name: Ammanna
children.otherInfo: Joined the Resu family through marriage. Health declined significantly

children.name: Parvatheesam
children.otherInfo: Departed at age 25 before marriage. Known for standing his ground in discussions with his grandfather Somanna

children.name: Annayya
children.otherInfo: Connected to the Karri family of Markondaputti through marriage. Father to two daughters

children.name: Lakshminarayana
children.otherInfo: Allied with the Trasula family of Bobbili through marriage. Passed without descendants

children.name: Veeranna
children.otherInfo: United with the Polavarapu family of Rangarayapuram through marriage

children.name: Suryanarayana
children.otherInfo: Known as Bobbili China Tata

children.name: Ammaji
children.otherInfo: Joined the Pedaprolu family of Jagadalpur through marriage, becoming mother to three sons and four daughters

children.name: Ramanamma
children.otherInfo: United with the Potnuru family of Parvatipuram through marriage. Passed away before having children

children.name: Prakasa Rao
children.otherInfo: Welcomed through adoption. Practices as a goldsmith in Parvatipuram

children.name: Narendra
children.otherInfo: Established in Parvatipuram

children.name: Rajesh
children.otherInfo: Established in Parvatipuram

children.name: Murali
children.otherInfo: Established in Parvatipuram

children.name: Chinnayya
children.otherInfo: Passed away before marriage

children.name: Daughters
children.otherInfo: One daughter who joined the Polavarapu family of Rangarayapuram through marriage

children.name: Daughters
children.otherInfo: Two daughters
